import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { MenuService } from '../services/menu-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu.component.css'] }) export class MenuComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private menuService: MenuService) { } menuService ngOnInit(): void { } }
